programme.title: Mystery on Mistletoe Lane
programme.desc: New to town, Heidi Wicks and her kids discover a Christmas mystery in their historic home. Local handyman and historian David helps along the way, finding his own surprising connection.

programme.title: A Glenbrooke Christmas
programme.desc: As Christmas nears, heiress Jessica Morgan seizes what seems like her last chance to experience a relaxed Christmas and heads off to the small town of Glenbrooke, where she meets a handsome fireman.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Miles feels he is competing with Rose's late husband; Blanche is mistreated by an old flame.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: Blanche's brother Clayton arrives from Atlanta with his boyfriend, Doug; Blanche claims to have accepted Clay's sexual orientation, but actually witnessing his lifestyle throws her a curve.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: When Miles admits to lying about his professional standing, Rose gives him the heave-ho.

programme.desc: Sophia throws herself into her job as recreational director at a retirement home.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles fills in for Frasier on the radio and helps an NBA star out of a slump.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Niles' opportunity with Daphne slips away when he hesitates after her breakup.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Barbra Jean dyes her hair red and transforms herself into a Reba look-alike; Reba senses Kyra is growing closer to her stepmother.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba and Brock attend an out-of-town funeral; Barbra Jean worries about her husband and his ex-wife being alone together; Reba sings.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Brock's mother says her son admits leaving Reba was a mistake; Cheyenne convinces Van to reconcile with his folks.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Van and Cheyenne reconcile with Van's parents and Reba begins to feel competitive when Van's parents shower the baby with extravagant gifts.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Reba and Barbra Jean spar in self-defense class; Brock and Van install an alarm system and allow Jake to pick the secret password.

programme.title: Reba
programme.desc: Barbra Jean is the high bidder in a school auction, winning Reba as her personal assistant for a day; Van's popularity with bidders makes Cheyenne jealous.

programme.title: Signed, Sealed, Delivered for Christmas
programme.desc: Postal detectives delay their own travel plans to help a little girl who wrote an urgent letter to God.

programme.title: Cranberry Christmas
programme.desc: A separated couple feign marital bliss on national television to help their town's Christmas festival and their business, but rekindled love is complicated by new opportunities.

programme.title: A Kismet Christmas
programme.desc: A children's author reconnects with her hometown, family and teenage crush while confronting a legend that may actually be true.

programme.title: Christmas Tree Lane
programme.desc: When music store owner Meg spearheads community efforts to save her street from demolition, she is shocked to find out that the man she's falling for is working for the company that she is fighting.

programme.title: A Cozy Christmas Inn
programme.desc: A real estate executive travels to Alaska during the holidays to acquire a bed-and-breakfast, only to discover it's owned by her ex. She's soon falling in love with the town and quite possibly him all over again.

programme.title: Cross Country Christmas
programme.desc: When a snowstorm disrupts both Lina's and Max's holiday plans, they realize they must work together to find a way home -- without taking it out on each other.

programme.title: Holiday Crashers
programme.desc: Best friends Toni and Bri have worked at the same card shop for more years than they should as both struggle to find their true life's path. Toni and Bri decide to create new identities to crash the Christmas parties.

programme.title: Checkin' It Twice
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a hockey player and a real estate agent after he moves into a cottage in her family's backyard.

programme.title: Snow Bride
programme.desc: A tabloid reporter races to find juicy gossip on a prominent political family. She ends up spending the week before Christmas with the family and falls for one of their sons.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: When Dorothy plans to remarry Stan, Sophia threatens to cut her off from the family.

programme.title: The Golden Girls
programme.desc: While Dorothy makes wedding arrangements, the others interview potential housemate Truby.

programme.desc: Rose auditions for a TV reporter job; Blanche seeks a commitment from a lukewarm beau.

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: The Cranes journey to Boston to celebrate Thanksgiving with Lilith and Frederick (Bebe Neuwirth and Trevor Einhorn).

programme.title: Frasier
programme.desc: Martin buys gifts for Frasier and Niles; Niles plans a party.

programme.title: Holiday Engagement
programme.desc: A woman (Bonnie Somerville) hires a man (Jordan Bridges) to pose as her fiance when she returns home for the holidays.

programme.title: My Christmas Dream
programme.desc: A department store manager sets out to create an amazing holiday display window to impress the owner. She asks a recently-fired employee to help her make the display, and as they work together, they start to fall in love.

programme.title: The Christmas Secret
programme.desc: A struggling single mother (Bethany Joy Lenz) searches for a lost family heirloom that she hopes will bring her love and good fortune in time for the holidays.

programme.title: Miracle in Bethlehem, PA
programme.desc: A single woman with a newly adopted baby gets stuck in Bethlehem, Pa.; with no room at the inn, she's forced to stay with a stranger who turns out to be the miracle she has needed.

programme.title: You, Me & the Christmas Trees
programme.desc: An arborist falls in love with a farmer as she tries to save his trees before the town tree lighting.

programme.title: 'Tis the Season to Be Irish
programme.desc: Rose tries to flip a house in Ireland but is blocked by Sean, a handsome local who wants to preserve the historic cottage.

programme.title: The Santa Class
programme.desc: Kate North, the owner of a struggling Santa School, and her instructor, Dan, must help an amnesia-stricken Santa Claus regain his memories to save Christmas and hopefully her school as well.

programme.title: Unwrapping Christmas: Mia's Prince
programme.desc: Romance novel enthusiast Mia meets Beau, a philanthropist, who is the spitting image of her favorite book hero. As they consider exploring a new romance, Beau's mother has other ideas.
